snippet: Rockstar Games, the video game studio behind the hugely successful Grand Theft Auto series, is to be awarded a British Academy of Film and Television Arts Academy Fellowship Award next week.
abstract: Rockstar Games, the video game studio behind the hugely successful Grand Theft Auto series, is to be awarded a British Academy of Film and Television Arts Academy Fellowship Award next week.

headline.main: Top British Prize for Grand Theft Auto Makers
